Articles.Content: I noticed when i was building my Munar base that when there's too many lights the effect get bugged (at the moment i don't have any images) and for example a zone that is in front of spotlight doesn't get lighted, it's normale? It can be fixed?

Have you tried right clicking an individual light and turning it off? does that fix the problem?

A lit area on my station would flick between lit and unlit but the light unit itself would stay the same. I just keep that light switched off.

The problem is your pixel light count. Press escape in-flight and turn it up. From what I have found, you can only so many lights on per setting until the lights overlap enough to make problems if you do not increase the pixel light count.
I believe HarvesteR explained that there is a limit to the number of light sources Unity can handle, and that Squad hasn't found a way around it.

So i just need to move high the pixel count?
